A Fast Algorithm for Automatic Classification .A Dattola, R. T. An economical classification process of order n log n (for n elements), which does not employ n-square procedures.. Conversion proofs are given and possible information retrieval applications are discussed.. .X 24	1	853 28	1	853 30	1	853 45	1	853 62	1	853 71	1	853 75	2	853 77	1	853 78	2	853 79	1	853 80	2	853 81	1	853 82	1	853 83	1	853 154	1	853 177	1	853 179	1	853 212	1	853 247	1	853 281	1	853 310	1	853 318	1	853 336	1	853 363	1	853 409	1	853 462	1	853 464	1	853 486	1	853 487	1	853 509	1	853 564	1	853 566	1	853 581	1	853 604	1	853 666	1	853 737	1	853 838	1	853 852	1	853 853	5	853 854	1	853 855	1	853 875	1	853 883	1	853 984	1	853 1011	1	853 1117	1	853 1140	1	853 1274	1	853 1393	1	853 1419	1	853 1431	1	853 1431	1	853
